mapper.select: select subject.subjecttitle as subjecttitle, subject.category as category, subjectapply.applyid as applyid, subjectapply.subject_subjectid as subject_subjectid, subjectapply.applycontent as applycontent, subjectapply.isteam as isteam, subjectapply.party_partyid as party_partyid, subjectapply.user_userid as user_userid, subjectapply.applyimg as applyimg from subjectapply left join subject on subject.subjectid=subjectapply.subject_subjectid where subjectapply.user_userid=#{searchWord} and subjectapply.isteam=1 limit #{onePageRecord} offset #{offsetPoint}
select count(applyid) from subjectapply where user_userid = #{param1} and isteam=1;
select * from user join subjectcontributor on subjectcontributor.user_userid = user.userid where subjectcontributor.subjectapply_applyid = #{param1};

select subject.subjecttitle as subjecttitle, subject.category as category, subjectapply.applyid as applyid, subjectapply.subject_subjectid as subject_subjectid, subjectapply.applycontent as applycontent, subjectapply.isteam as isteam, subjectapply.party_partyid as party_partyid, subjectapply.user_userid as user_userid, subjectapply.applyimg as applyimg from subjectapply left join subject on subject.subjectid=subjectapply.subject_subjectid left join subjectcontributor sc on subjectapply.applyid = sc.subjectapply_applyid where sc.user_userid=#{searchWord} and subjectapply.isteam=0 limit #{onePageRecord} offset #{offsetPoint}
